About
ocws
2023-08-03T14:54:35+00:00
About us
Villa Farms is a Luxury Living and award winning community! It sits on 12 acres of professionally landscaped property and is locally owned and operated. Our 55+ community is located in Putnam County and is only 1.5 miles to the nearest shopping, restaurants, banks and more. This makes it hard to find another community that is within ideal proximity to everything.
What makes us award winning? According to Bill Herrington, developer/owner and property manager, Villa Farms has “received several awards for beautification and maintenance of the park. We were voted ‘Reader’s Choice’ for Best Retirement Community. for 10 consecutive years.”
Most of the homes in our community are 2/bedroom and 2/bath and each are situated on poured concrete footers. The homes also have additions of screened in areas and covered carports. Just with these two features you will be able to enjoy your new friends and dodge any rain drops that might come up unexpectedly. Residents own their own homes and lease their site.
What We have to Offer
64 total home sites
Clubhouse that includes service kitchen
Sparkling blue Pool with Rock Water Feature
Paved and Lighted Streets
Upscale Street Signage
RV/Boat Storage
Underground Utilities
Privacy Fencing Around Property
Our lots lease for $425.00 per month and additional fees apply for RV/Boat storage. We are a State of Florida licensed DVM manufactured home dealer. Once you visit you won’t want to leave, let Villa Farms become your home for Luxury Living.
